mapper.insert: insert into comment ( comment_type, comment_content, submit_time, user_id, is_check,is_read) values (#{comment.commentType},#{comment.commentContent},#{comment.submitTime},#{comment.userId},0,0)
mapper.select: select id,type,content,time from invite_and_reply where invited_user_id=#{userId} and is_read=0 order by time asc
select user_id,user_name,password,name,sex,age,phone_number from user where is_del=0 and user_id=#{userId}
select comment_id,comment_type,comment_content,answer_content,check_time from comment where user_id=#{userId} and is_check = 1 and is_read = 0;
mapper.update: update comment set is_read=1 where comment_id=#{commentId}
update invite_and_reply set is_read=1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select d.serial as serial,s.student_name as studentName,t.tutor_name as tutorName,d.time as time from dingdan d,tutor t,student s where t.tutor_id=d.tutor_id and s.student_id=d.student_id and d.is_del=0 and (d.tutor_user_id=#{userId} or d.student_user_id=#{userId})
